name: Plain By Plain
description:
A short card game made for the Honest Game Jam 2022. 

Tutorial in game.

Move around the board by dragging with the right mouse button.

Be careful where you place your cards, you can lock yourself out of completing a quest if you block a quest card in!

Note: 

While the game is playable, its not very polished. There are a few things that work in a way that wasn't intended and a few quality of life features that don't work at all. I'm really sorry about that, I've spent the majority of the jam time trying to fix them but honestly I'd rather have a playable but unpolished game than nothing at all.

Hope you enjoy anyway :)
